language.entry: 随着冒险的进行, 成员们逐渐感到饥饿.
进食 %.0f 食物, 恢复 %d%% 生命
不吃东西, 承受 %d%% 伤害和压力
物品栏已满. 扔掉一些物品.
这是我们仅有的光亮了.
不能再第一个房间扎营
(只用中等和大型任务才能露营.)
至少用4个非咒缚者英雄进行冒险. 这个暂时不能被解雇.
没有足够的空间拿取全部. 请整理物品栏.
库存已满. 出售或丢弃一些饰品.
该技能每次扎营只能用一次.
至少有些东西让我们记住他们...
不能同时装备两个相同饰品.
驿站是空的. 下个任务之后再来.
明亮 - 轻度增加怪物的攻击、玩家的暴击、压力、拾取。
微弱 - 增加怪物的攻击、玩家的暴击、压力、拾取。
阴暗 - 大量增加怪物的攻击、玩家的暴击、压力、拾取。
黑暗 - 极大增加怪物的攻击、玩家的暴击、压力、拾取。
金钱可以用来贿赂, 建立帝国, 以及雇凶杀人.
进食可以恢复生命和缓解饥饿. 每个成员消耗1单位食物.
用于穿过危险或其它的东西.
A simple necklace fashioned out of bronze.
A sculpted bust of a once prominent local figure.
An oil painting of some distant family relation.
Scriven records of land grants in generations past.
A sigil of honor earned by family actions long since past.
Though painted a hundred years ago, the resemblance to you is uncanny.
A surviving trophy from a past holy war.
Powerful medicines... worth more than gold to a beleaguered 小镇.
A bag of precious unspoiled grain.
Some things are better left unopened.
An implement for hard labor and occasional destruction.
A terribly strong concoction to counter the effects of disease and infection.
Used to purify the corrupted altars.
It emits an otherworldly luminescence, used to light Protective Wards.
The colors shift and change with the light...
The shard of a wooden bench said to once hold followers of the Prophet!
Use to camp. Make sure to have enough food for the meal phase or heroes will 挨饿!
Use to clear obstacles and break into things.
Use to cross hazards and secure items.
Use to counter blights, poisons, and toxins.
Use to cleanse items and prevent maladies. Can also be applied to a hero to eliminate combat debuffs.
Use to unlock strongboxes and doors.
Use to purge evil and restore purity. Can also be applied to a hero to increase resistances.
Use to stanch the flow of bleeding.
Greatly increases the hound's vigor for a short time.
我犯了一个巨大的错误.
Short for "accuracy". Base chance 命中率 is ACC minus the enemy's DODGE.
A log of major events that occur at the 庄园 each week. Can be accessed while in the 小镇.

A temporary condition that may be triggered when a hero reaches 100 压力. Afflicted heroes act on their own and suffer stat penalties. Afflictions can be 诅咒 in town by reducing the hero's 压力 at the 教堂 or the 酒馆.
A type of 补给 used to remove 腐蚀. It also has uses on many dungeon curios.
A hero's 护甲 determines her base DODGE and MAX HP. 护甲 can be upgraded at the 铁匠铺.
A type of 补给 used to remove 流血. It also has uses on many dungeon curios.
Heroes or enemies with 流血 take damage each combat round or hallway step. It will eventually go away but can be 诅咒 early with bandages, combat skills, and Camping skills.
Heroes or enemies with 腐蚀 take damage each combat round or hallway step. It will eventually go away but can be 诅咒 early with 解毒剂, combat skills, and Camping skills.
An 祖产 typically found in the 遗迹. Used to upgrade buildings in Town.
An ability used by a hero during Camping.
An ability used by a hero during combat.

Most dead monsters leave a temporary 尸体. Corpses preserve the enemy order for a time and require heroes to use skills to attack around the corpses, move 其它 enemies in reach, and so on. Alternatively, corpses can be attacked and cleared manually.
An 祖产 found in all dungeons. Used to upgrade buildings in Town.
Short for "critical hit chance". Critical hits do extra damage and provide 压力 relief (when a hero crits) or 压力 damage (when a monster crits).
A hit taken by a hero on 濒死 that permanently kills the hero.
A hero with 0 HP is at 濒死. Each subsequent hit taken while at 濒死 has a chance of permanently killing the hero.
An 祖产 typically found in the 荒野. Used to upgrade buildings in Town.
A temporary sickness that debilitates the hero in some way. Can be 诅咒 by some combat skills or Camping skills, but usually needs treated in town at the 疗养院.
Short for "damage". Determines how many health points, or HP, are removed from the target if an attack connects.
Dodge gets removed from the enemy's Accuracy to determine base chance 命中率.
Commonly refers to the 武器 and 护甲 equipped to a hero, but can also include 饰品. Weapons and 护甲 cannot be unequipped but can be upgraded.
A type of 补给 used for Camping meals and 其它 meals while wandering. Can be fed individually to a hero for a small boost in HP.
The basic currency of the 庄园. Used to purchase 饰品, learn and upgrade skills, and upgrade 装备.
A 心衰 occurs when a hero reaches 200 压力. This will drop a hero to 濒死, or kill one already there.
A special currency type that is most often used to upgrade buildings in Town. There are four types of Heirlooms: Busts, Deeds, Portraits, and Crests.
A type of 补给 used to temporarily increase a hero's resistances. Also can be used on dungeon curios.
Short for "health points". HP is removed as damage is taken. A hero with 0 HP is at 濒死.
A type of 补给 used to cure a hero's combat debuffs. Also can be used on dungeon curios.
An effect that moves the target forward or backward in the party lineup.
Bonus towards resisting enemy moves that cause a position change.
An object found in dungeons that impedes the party's progress. They can be removed by hand or with a 铁铲. Clearing an obstacle by hand inflicts DMG and 压力 on the entire party.
An 祖产 typically found in the 兽窟. Used to upgrade buildings in Town.
Short for "protection". Indicates what percentage of incoming damage is mitigated. DOTs (流血, 腐蚀) ignore PROT.
An item that can be added to the player's inventory before embarking on a quest.
A character trait on a hero. Quirks can be beneficial (positive) or hindering (negative). Heroes may start with some quirks but acquire more through adventuring.
A stat that influences how likely a hero is to 抗性 a particular status, such as 击晕 or 流血.

The veteran level of a hero. A hero with higher 决心等级 can better 抗性 压力, learn higher level skills and wield higher level 装备. Higher 决心等级 heroes will not waste their time on lower level quests. Low 决心等级 heroes adventuring in higher level dungeons will find it more stressful.
Earning 决心 XP progresses a hero towards the next 决心等级. 决心 XP can only be earned by completing quests. Heroes do not earn 决心 XP if they abandon or fail quests.
The collection of all the player's hired heroes.
A type of 补给. Used to clear obstacles to prevent taking DMG and 压力.
A type of 补给 used on curios in dungeons.
Short for "speed". Speed influences the order in which combatants act. Initiative is re-rolled each round.
Accrues as heroes travel through dungeons and engage in combat. When a hero reaches 100 压力, she acquires either an 折磨 or a 美德. At 200 压力, the hero suffers a 心衰.
An effect that forces the hero or enemy to 跳过 on his/her next turn.
A type of 补给. Used to increase the current torchlight within a dungeon.
The amount of light in a dungeon. Adventuring in brightness is safer but less rewarding, while adventuring in darknesss is more dangerous but more rewarding. Can be increased by using torches.
A bonus towards avoiding or disarming traps.
A temporary condition of increased effectiveness that a hero acquires after passing an 折磨 Check. Virtued heroes have buffs and may 增益 or otherwise increase the power of their allies.
A type of 装备 used by a hero to combat the dangers found in dungeons. A hero's 武器 determines his/her base DMG, CRIT and SPD. Weapons can be upgraded at the 铁匠铺.
Made whenever a hero reaches 100 压力 and results in an 折磨 or 美德 state.
Made at the beginning of each battle to determine which group is surprised. Surprised heroes have their order jumbled. Surprised enemies act last in the round.
A hidden log of which Afflictions a particular hero has a tendency to develop.
An interactive prop found in a dungeon hallway or room.
徒手清障, 这会花费很大力气...
使用扎营技能来恢复团队身心健康.
In time, you will know the tragic extent of my failings...
Let me share with you the terrible wonders I have come to know...
A Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals in the shattered halls of your ancestral home. It must be stopped.
Deep within the shattered vaults of your ancestral home, a Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals... even raising the dead! It must be stopped.
A Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals in the shattered halls of your ancestral home... it must be stopped.
A Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals in the shattered halls of your ancestral home... it must be stopped.
A Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals in the shattered halls of your ancestral home... it must be stopped.
Snapped bones and tanned human hides are the spoor of a vile cannibalistic hag. For all that is good, destroy her.
Snapped bones and tanned human hides are the spoor of a vile cannibalistic hag. For all that is good, destroy her.
Snapped bones and tanned human hides are the spoor of a vile cannibalistic hag. For all that is good, destroy her.
A broken adventurer tells of a beast so unspeakable and terrible that the swinefolk have made it their Lord. Perhaps it is only rumor and shadow, but this threat cannot be left to fester.
A broken adventurer tells of a beast so unspeakable and terrible that the swinefolk have made it their Lord. Perhaps it is only rumor and shadow, but this threat cannot be left to fester.
A broken adventurer tells of a beast so unspeakable and terrible that the swinefolk have made it their Lord. Perhaps it is only rumor and shadow, but this threat cannot be left to fester.
Raving 疯子, doom bearer, apocalyptic herald. Whatever his role, there is a sickness in his wild sermons that must be silenced. Dispose of this "Prophet."
Raving 疯子, doom bearer, apocalyptic herald. Whatever his role, there is a sickness in his wild sermons that must be silenced. Dispose of this "Prophet."
Raving 疯子, doom bearer, apocalyptic herald. Whatever his role, there is a sickness in his wild sermons that must be silenced. Dispose of this "Prophet."
As long as the thieves and ruffians man a cannon on the Old Road, the 小镇 will be cut off from trade. Demolish this ironwork devil!
As long as the thieves and ruffians man a cannon on the Old Road, the 小镇 will be cut off from trade. Demolish this ironwork devil!
As long as the thieves and ruffians man a cannon on the Old Road, the 小镇 will be cut off from trade. Demolish this ironwork devil!
Some things were never meant to live. Cleanse the sin of the Ancestor's experimentations and put this 咒缚者 into the abyss where it belongs.
Some things were never meant to live. Cleanse the sin of the Ancestor's experimentations and put this 咒缚者 into the abyss where it belongs.
Some things were never meant to live. Cleanse the sin of the Ancestor's experimentations and put this 咒缚者 into the abyss where it belongs.
Haunting melodies and otherworldy bass notes echo from the cliffs beneath the Manor. Discover the source...and silence it.
Haunting melodies and otherworldy bass notes echo from the cliffs beneath the Manor. Discover the source...and silence it.
Haunting melodies and otherworldy bass notes echo from the cliffs beneath the Manor. Discover the source...and silence it.
The vengeful wraiths threaten to drag all we've built down into their domain of 黑暗. Give them a sailor's death - once and for all!
The vengeful wraiths threaten to drag all we've built down into their domain of 黑暗. Give them a sailor's death - once and for all!
The vengeful wraiths threaten to drag all we've built down into their domain of 黑暗. Give them a sailor's death - once and for all!
Test yourself in the mad realm of your fallen ancestor. Take note of how the creatures have taken over, but don't delve too far.
Unholy machinations have crushed together hallway and vault. Explore your ancestral home as far as you are able.
Is an apocalypse building? Cinch your packs and delve far, far into the tunnels of your fallen family. Make a map of your expedition.
Unholy abominations turning the Light against itself. Meet them in battle and learn how they fight.
They can be killed. They can be beaten.
There are times for strategy, and times for brute force. Send the undead back to the hells from which they were summoned. All of them.
When the 庄园 was overrun, so too were many treasures and symbols of the Light. The Abbot will pay dearly for such relics.
The unholy abominations inhabiting the crumbling house have turned beacons of Light into vessels for diabolical worship. Cleanse these altars with Consecrated Essence and bring back the Light.
Take the Old Road into the wood and then pick any of the dozens of dark paths. Test that path and then 返回 with your heads intact.
The Old Road is obscured by the corrupted, poisoned overgrowth. Explore and 返回 with a full description of every side path you visit.
The 荒野 was nearly inscrutable even before the corruption. Now it is nothing but dark mystery. 补给 well and mount an expedition to map as much ground as you can.
Beat back the creatures and bandits that endanger traffic on the Old Road.
Infection spreads unless checked. Put a tourniquet on the festering wood by destroying any creature you encounter.
Endless winding paths all arive at the same place: the enemy. Bring war to the 荒野.
Many a cart-driver has met their end while traversing the 荒野. A king's ransom of medicines was recently abandoned. They would greatly assist in rebuilding this sickly 小镇.
Blighted corpses lay strewn about the Old Road, teeming with filth and disease. Journeys to and from the 小镇 pose constant threat of sickness. Destroy this 腐蚀 with Potent Salve.
The beast-men spill forth from a thousand gaping holes. Pick one and search its extents.
Explore the 兽窟. With a better understanding of where the creatures are coming from, future raids can target their sources of power.
Gain entry to the network of tunnels and take them to every possible extent you can manage. 返回 with a complete map.
An exploratory sortie into a mad realm of tunnels. Meet the enemy in battle, and then fade to safety with newfound information.
They can be killed. They can be beaten. Starting now.
The swinefolk are growing in strength and numbers. Cut them like diseased wheat.
The swine's appetite for comestibles exceeds even their thirst for blood. Winter is always close, and the 小镇 would do well to restock its sparse larder.
The beast-men have erected crude and dirty shrines to their pagan Gods. Knock them down with pick-axe and might and impede their worship!
Scout the unwholesome rocky formations beneath the Manor for signs of life.
Plunge into forgotten grottos and assess the cancerous extent of the fishfolk's domain.
Follow every cavern and grotto to its conclusion and discover from whence the malign currents flow.
A fish on two legs? Test the strength of this new menace.
Take the fight to the waters and 显示 them our landward strength.
This aquatic cult respects nothing but force. Leave a trail of scales and gills and let them dwell on that.
Your Ancestor was receiving eldritch relics via marine shipments. Find and 返回 them to town where they can be stored safely out of the hands of greater evils.
The power of the fishfolk grows with every moon! Light the ancient wards, and drain some of the natural power that they draw upon.
任务过程中可以扎营1次
任务过程中可以扎营2次
任务过程中可以扎营3次
任务过程中可以扎营4次
不会返还费用, 但英雄可以立即加入任务, 你确定么?
这将永久解雇英雄, 是否继续?
这个地牢对我来说太难了!
从名册拖一个英雄至此.
Reduces cost of upgrading hero skills.
Allows upgrading hero combat skills to higher ranks.
Increases the number of recruits available for hire. The change will take effect after you 返回 from your next quest.
Increases the size of the hero roster.
Allows upgrading hero weapons to higher ranks.
Allows upgrading hero 护甲 to higher ranks.
Reduces cost of hero 武器 and 护甲 upgrades.
Reduces the cost of 扎营技能 purchases.
Reduces the cost of 疗养院 特质 treatments.
Increases the number of 疗养院 treatment slots.
Reduces the cost of 疗养院 disease treatments.
Reduces the cost of 饰品 purchases.
Increases the number of available 饰品 at the 货车.
Increases chance of 折磨 cure
Increases number of treatment ward slots to %d
Increases number of medical ward slots to %d
Increases chance of curing extra diseases.
Reduces positive 特质 treatment cost by %d%%
Reduces negative 特质 treatment cost by %d%%
Increase chances to cure all diseases to %d%%
Allows 武器 upgrades to rank %d
Allows 护甲 upgrades to rank %d
Reduces cost of 武器 and 护甲 upgrades by %d%%
Reduces cost of training Camping skills by %d%%
Reduces cost of skill training by %d%%
Increases number of 饰品 available to %d
Increases number of available heroes to %d
有一个英雄被抓获, 如果现在撤退将失去该英雄, 确定撤退吗?
确定要撤退? 英雄将会遭受压力...
Attracts enemies and takes more damage from some attacks.
Takes extra damage from some hero attacks.
Stat penalties, plus the next blow could be fatal!
清出通往首领的道路! 进展: %3.0f%%
进入令人神智癫狂的领域.
探索其它区域来解锁这里.
确定卖出 %s 来获得 %d 金币?
Fear has overwhelmed the hero, whose every thought is now turned to self-preservation.
Wolves lie in wait behind every tree; diseases are in every meal; avarice behind every friend.
Pain is pleasure to the Just, to the Willing, to the Surivor.
Anger flows forth into action. Might is survival. The weak must fall.
"I say let the world go to hell, but I should always have my tea."
Cast off, adrift, in a dark sea amongst jagged rocks.
Two and two make three while six and seven break free.
The Caretaker is currently enjoying this activity...
Powerful spirits will wash the taste of maggots out of my mouth.
Powerful spirits will wash the taste of maggots out of my mouth.
My very soul rests on this throw of the dice! Again!
My very soul rests on this throw of the dice! Again!
A loveless embrace - what cruel irony!
A loveless embrace - what cruel irony!
Sometimes it's nice to find a quiet spot, that my dark musings go undisturbed.
Sometimes it's nice to find a quiet spot, that my dark musings go undisturbed.
I pray, I beseech - GET ME AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!
I pray, I beseech - GET ME AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!
Take my blood as you have taken my mind! Whoo-hahahaha!
Take my blood as you have taken my mind! Whoo-hahahaha!
This version of 极暗地牢 has been created specifically for demonstration purposes. Saving is disabled. Purchase the full version on the Mac App Store!
极暗地牢 is about making the most of a bad situation. Quests will fail or must be abandoned. Heroes will die. And when they die, they stay dead. Progress autosaves constantly, so actions are permanent.

The game expects a lot out of you. How far will you push your adventurers? How much are you willing to risk in your quest to restore the 小镇? What will you sacrifice to save the life of your favorite hero?
Thankfully, there are always fresh souls arriving on the 驿站, seeking both adventure and fame in the shadow of the...
Your save file appears to have been corrupted. We recommend backing up your save files to your Desktop or 其它 location before continuing.
This version of 极暗地牢 has been created specifically for demonstration purposes
一个小收藏, 有点价值.
Level 1 heroes can now appear in the 驿站.
Level 2 heroes can now appear in the 驿站.
Level 3 heroes can now appear in the 驿站.
{colour_start|notable}%s{colour_end} survived a successful quest in the 极暗地牢.
{colour_start|notable}%s{colour_end} dealt the final blow to slay the Heart of 黑暗!
A shimmering likeness of your Ancestor! He wishes to speak...
Your first expedition into the 遗迹 of your ancestry. Be curious, be careful.
Succeed in your first assault on the 极暗地牢.
Succeed in your second assault on the 极暗地牢.
Succeed in your third assault on the 极暗地牢.
Rapturous Cultists will give their lives to protect their allies!
The protective Talismans will only shield those who equip them...beware the Templars!
Prepare yourself for the longest, most gruelling quest of your campaign.
Do you wish to tackle the increased challenge of New Game+? This mode features a campaign fail state, and tougher enemies.

You have unlocked the ability to begin a new, more challenging campaign! When you create a new save file, you will be prompted if you wish to enable the 'NG+' ruleset. Be warned, in an NG+ campaign, monsters are tougher, they hit harder, and losing too many heroes or taking too many weeks will result in failure! The stagecoach awaits...
I'm never going back to that place.
I'm never going back to that place.
I'm never going back to that place.
I'm never going back to that place.
I'm never going back to that place.
If a 极暗地牢 quest is abandoned, not all heroes are guaranteed to survive. Someone must sacrifice themselves to hold off the fiends during retreat.
You can not retreat from this quest. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You should equip the following 饰品 before embarking, or failure is nearly certain:
Test yourself in the mad realm of your fallen ancestor. Take note of how the creatures have taken over, but don't delve too far.
{?hero_names}%s set forth to explore the 遗迹. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s could not finish exploring the 遗迹. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s were successful in exploring the 遗迹. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The creature's power waxes terrible. Recover the protective relics from the long-abandoned base camp, but beware the Shuffling Horror.
The creature's gestation must be interrupted! Overwhelm the defending force and illuminate the beacons - force the Thing to reveal itself prematurely!
Your enemy is vast, sprawling, and must be destroyed from within. Slog through the twisting maze and find your way to its throbbing heart.
At last, the twisted heart of the world is laid bare -- for sword, or supplication.
{?hero_names}%s took the first steps into the 极暗地牢. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s could not clear the way forward. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s returned from the 黑暗 and found the ancestor's resting ground! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s progressed deeper into the 黑暗. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s could not light all the beacons. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s returned from the 黑暗 and lit the way forward! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s entered the belly of the beast. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s returned from the 黑暗 and opened the portal! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s could not handle the depths of the 黑暗. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s returned from the 黑暗 and slayed the ancestor! ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
The left hand of some malefactor who died on the gallows, made into a candle with the man's own fat.
This item is needed for a 极暗地牢 quest.
This item cannot be sold. (It might be a free item that came from using a specific class, like 解毒剂 from the 瘟疫医生.)
Do you want to start a NewGame+ campaign?
These gameplay settings cannot be changed for a Stygian game.
Too much time has passed - the creature has grown strong and is ready to take to the stars!
The blood of the fallen has invigorated the Thing, accelerating its rebirth!
Successfully complete your first foray into the 遗迹
Succeed in your first assault on the 极暗地牢.
Succeed in your second assault on the 极暗地牢.
Succeed in your third assault on the 极暗地牢.
完成终极极暗地牢任务.
Not me! I am a learned scholar!
Finally, the face of my tormentor. Come, then.
A proper lady does not volunteer herself for slaughter!
Spare the others, I am ready.
Unholy foulness! I will take you with me!
Send me to hell then! AAAKYLORAAAHHH!
Steady, girl. If we're called, we answer.
Whatever awaits, it cannot be worse than what I've endured.
No way out. hmph. Let's do this.
I go with a clear conscience. I've given my all.
Please, no! I want to live!
Hah! The joke's on me then...?
So I'm the final antique, yet nothing will be around to collect...
All for one, and one for all!
